parameters.content: # Analyze and split source into topics

workflowId.cachedResultName: Boost — Analyze and split source topics

parameters.formDescription:
This form allows you to upload an image that will override the existing 'featured_image_url' property with a new url to your uploaded image.

Your uploaded image will be:
- converted to webp
- upload to a Digital Ocean space with a URL

Finally, the airtable record you clicked to get to this form will be updated with a new 'featured_image_url'
